structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Removal Of Motor Vehicles From Private Ways Or Property; Penalties; Liability For Removal And Storage Charges; Release Of Vehicle

text.section: the maximum amount for towing or transportation of motor vehicles established by the department of telecommunications and energy for motor vehicles towed away when such towing is ordered by the police or other public authority under the provisions of section six B of chapter one hundred and fifty-nine B; and

the maximum charge for storage of non-commercial passenger motor vehicles with a maximum capacity of nine persons, shall be not more than the maximum storage charge allowed under the provisions of said section six B of said chapter one hundred and fifty-nine B.
